definitions.definition: To observe or inspect carefully or critically .
examples: He examined the crime scene for clues.
She examined the hair sample under a microscope.

definitions.definition: To check the health or condition of something or someone.
To determine the aptitude , skills or qualifications of someone by subjecting them to an examination .

examples: The witness was examined under oath.

main_definition: To observe or inspect carefully or critically .
secondary_definitions: To check the health or condition of something or someone.
To determine the aptitude , skills or qualifications of someone by subjecting them to an examination .
